name: The King of Gaming Bugs!
author: Tony
content: Song An, the bottom social animal, is a down-and-out programmer. His daily work is responsible for fixing bugs in a game called [New World]. However, he is more keen to secretly add his own little easter eggs in the game. Turned into a real world, relying on the understanding of the bugs in the game and the easter eggs set by himself, can Song An successfully counterattack?
